name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Rurouni Kenshin, Ranma 1/2, Cowboy Bebop, Log Horizon, Puella Magi Madoka Magica fer me.    Honorable mentions.   Dot-hack, but it got too dragging, and should've only been 1 season.   Ditto the Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya, exactly as above.  I do like Neon Genesis Evangelion as well, but I felt that the symbolism hurt it as much as it supported it. Too many red herrings.

I do like Neon Genesis Evangelion as well, but I felt that the symbolism hurt it as much as it supported it. Too many red herrings.
